li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page current-menu-item page_item page-item-1501 current_page_item menu-item-1528

ul.li: 3/17/2020 ZCSD Student Feeding Program: Please click here
3/9/2020 Chickenpox: Please see the attached notification regarding a diagnosed case of chickenpox at Zachary Early Learning Center.

li.strong: 3/6/2020 ZCSD COVID-19 District Update-Stop the Spread!

ul.li:
2/10/2020 ZCSD COVID-19 LA Dept of Health: The Zachary Community School District will continue to follow proper health and safety precautions to ensure the well-being of all students and staff. With recent news about the Coronavirus and the Mumps, we have attached additional information provided by the Louisiana Department of Health and Hospitals and the CDC. The ZCSD follows the Communicable Disease Control guidelines for prevention and identification of possible cases of the virus and state guidelines relative to immunization requirements.
ZCSD Coronavirus/Mumps Release

11/5/2019: Flu season is here. As ZCSD continues to keep our students safe and healthy, we are sharing a “flu fact sheet” that has been provided to us by the Louisiana Department of Health. The ZCSD wants to keep your children and the adults who care for them healthy.

li.a: What to do if you are sick

p.br:
COVID19 General Information
1-855-523-2652 or 211
Available 8:00 A.M.- 4:30 P.M.
Monday-Friday

div.div: Copyright © Zachary Community School District 2020 - All Rights Reserved. The Zachary Community School Board as an Equal Opportunity Employer, who fully and actively supports equal access for all qualified applicants, regardless of race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability status, Genetic Information or Testing, Family & Medical Leave, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law, and prohibits retaliation against individuals who bring forth any complaint, orally or in writing, to the employer or the government, or against any individuals who assist or participate in the investigation of any complaint, or otherwise oppose discrimination. The Zachary Community School does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, disability, or age in its programs and activities and provides equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups. The person responsible for compliance with 504 and ADA is Aeneid Mason and Title IX is Gwendolyn Longmire.
